errors.error_description: The installation instructions include 'pip install beautifulsoup4', which is an unnecessary dependency. The 'fundus' package manages its own dependencies automatically when installed.
correction_candidates: Remove the line 'pip install beautifulsoup4'. 'fundus' handles its own dependencies.
errors.golden_answer: Remove the line 'pip install beautifulsoup4'. 'fundus' handles its own dependencies.
